WHY CLOUDHULK?

The mission of CloudHulk is to provide the highest quality cloud shared hosting solution with 100% uptime for your business to succeed online.

Our focus lies in 5 key areas:

✔ Fast Servers
✔ 100% Uptime Guarantee
✔ Anytime Moneyback Guarantee
✔ Real 24/7 Tech Support
✔ Business Class Hosting

To back our 100% uptime guarantee, we have an unbeatable SLA where you get generously compensated in the unlikely downtime event.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS (FAQ)

Q: Are you kidding? $9.99/year and reliable?
A: We aren't kidding. Admittedly, this promotion is selling at a loss. However, we trust that customers who signed up will be in love with our service and renew them for many years to come. As you can see, our renewal rates are more in line with our competitors. At just $9.99 for the first year, there's really no harm trying us out right?

Q: How long have you in business?
A: CloudHulk is a sister brand of Limenex, which has been providing web hosting services since 2010 with excellent reviews, and are both managed by the same company. CloudHulk was setup to cater to a different market from Limenex.

Have a question for us? No problem! Contact us here and we will be glad to assist you!
